channel.title: BronzeGod 718 | Custom Items & Bosses | 24/7 VPS Hosted | Friendly Community
channel.description:
[b][size=24pt]ABOUT[/size][/b] [b]BronzeGod 718's goal is to provide free-to-play entertainment for veteran players looking to play Pre-EoC servers. We constantly provide new updates and fixes to make BronzeGod a more enjoyable server. Our website has a basic layout with easy navigation, and our forums have a professional layout, making them simple and user-friendly. What are you waiting for? Join BronzeGod 718 today and start your adventure![/b]
[b][size=24pt]CONTENT[/size][/b]
[ul][li]Unique Hometown Convinient Shops Organized Teleporting System ALL skills trainable Perfected XP rates 30 + Custom Items (Obtainable by regular players) Armadyl (GWD) Bandos (GWD) Saradomin (GWD) Zamorak (GWD) Nex (GWD) Tormented Demons Kalphite Queen Queen Black Dragon Dagannoth Kings King Black Dragon Corporeal Beast Nomad The Sunfreet (Custom Boss) Lucien (Custom Boss) Balance Elemental (Custom Boss) Barrelchest (Custom Boss) The Phoenix (Custom Boss) Pestqueen (Custom Boss) Soul Wars Clan Wars Castle Wars Fight Pits Fight Kiln Fight Cave Crucible Supreme Fight Game (Custom Minigame) Trivia (Custom Minigame) RFD (Custom Minigame) Dominion Tower Barrows Taverly Dungeon Brimhaven Dungeon Polypore Dungeon Glacor Cave Frost Dragons Slayer Tower Living Rock Cavern Unique PvP Areas Drygore Weaponry Off-hand Drygore Weaponry (act like defenders) Added Skillcapes Added Rank Capes Ascension Crossbow (w/ Bolts) 30+ Partyhats/Santa Hats/H'weens Paladin Armor Set (Zamorak Drop) Brutal Abyssal Whip (Zamorak Drop)[/li] [li][/li][/ul]
[b][size=24pt]VISUAL[/size][/b] [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mQ5_tt-AigA[/youtube] [img]http://i32.photobucket.com/albums/d18/bronzegod718donations/Screenshot_14_zpsf66ae4c5.png[/img] [img]http://i32.photobucket.com/albums/d18/bronzegod718donations/Screenshot_52_zpsc726fe0f.png[/img] [img]http://i32.photobucket.com/albums/d18/bronzegod718donations/Screenshot_42_zps1d70607f.png[/img] [img]http://i32.photobucket.com/albums/d18/bronzegod718donations/Screenshot_13_zps44b456a8.png[/img] [img]http://i32.photobucket.com/albums/d18/bronzegod718donations/Screenshot_32_zpsd7ec0fd4.png[/img] [img]http://i32.photobucket.com/albums/d18/bronzegod718donations/Screenshot_22_zps81ded00d.png[/img] [img]http://i32.photobucket.com/albums/d18/bronzegod718donations/Screenshot_12_zpsf141199c.png[/img] [img]http://i32.photobucket.com/albums/d18/bronzegod718donations/Screenshot_12_zpsf5df08ed.png[/img] [img]http://i32.photobucket.com/albums/d18/bronzegod718donations/Screenshot_11_zpsbf46761b.png[/img] [img]http://i32.photobucket.com/albums/d18/bronzegod718donations/Screenshot_10_zps07d79fc4.png[/img] [img]http://i32.photobucket.com/albums/d18/bronzegod718donations/Screenshot_7_zpsb06ec109.png[/img]
[b][size=24pt]STAFF APPLICATIONS[/size][/b] [b]We are in desperate need of staff members! Visit the forums on the website to apply![/b]
[b][size=24pt]LINKS[/size][/b]
WEBSITE: [url=http://www.bronzegodrs.com]www.bronzegodrs.com[/url]
PLAY NOW: [url=http://www.bronzegodrs.com/play-now.html]www.bronzegodrs.com/play-now.html[/url]

item.title: BronzeGod 718 | Custom Items & Bosses | 24/7 VPS Hosted | Friendly Community
item.dc:creator: @BronzeGod BronzeGod
item.description:
@BronzeGod wrote:

dun dun dun:

Don’t really like the custom weapons, but good luck anyways.

I thought it would be a unique features, as we have custom melee, range, and mage, so everything is balanced. They’re also very hard to obtain, and NOT only donators, so it’s not pay to win.

Read full topic

item.title: BronzeGod 718 | Custom Items & Bosses | 24/7 VPS Hosted | Friendly Community
item.dc:creator: @BronzeGod BronzeGod
item.description:
@BronzeGod wrote:

Newest and BIGGEST update yet:

NPCs:
Added damage caps to GWD bosses
Added damage caps to QBD
Added damage caps to Nomad
Added damage caps to Corporeal Beast
Added damage cap to Nex
NEW ITEMS:
Added Elemental Spirit Shield
Added Zaros Spirit Shield
Added 120 Mastery Capes
Gave Elemental Spirit Shield very high defensive stats
Gave Zaros Spirit Shield very high defensive stats
LINKS:
Fixed ::vote
Fixed ::website with updated link
SHOPS:
Added Helm of Neitznot to Extra Items Shop
Fixed Extreme Donator pets in regular Donator shop
Added ::bosskills to show total GWD boss kills
Added Extreme Flasks to regular Donator shop
Added Overload (6) flasks to Extreme Donator Shop
Added Initiate Set to Extra Items Shop
Added Infinity Robes to Magic Shop
Changed Infinity Robes Prices
Fixed Varrock Teleport Tab Prices
Added an Extra Items Shop to the hometown
Added infinity robes to hometown shop
Released ruby bolts (e) in ranging shop
CUSTOM BOSSES:
Raised Balance Elemental HP to 10,000
Added Elemental Spirit Shield to Balance Elemental’s drop table
Added Zaros Spirit Shield to Nex’s drop table
COMMANDS:
Added ::reportbug (bug) to give us the bugs you find
Added ::suggestions (your suggestion) to give us suggestions
Multiple new Admin Commands
MISCELLANEOUS:
Fixed Winter Storage for Pack Yacks

Read full topic
item.source: BronzeGod 718 | Custom Items & Bosses | 24/7 VPS Hosted | Friendly Community

item.title: BronzeGod 718 | Custom Items & Bosses | 24/7 VPS Hosted | Friendly Community
item.dc:creator: @khayam khayam
item.description:
@khayam wrote:

Just joined it today, this server has potential and the community is really friendly!
Please just dont look at pics and say its another 667+ leech, its not the staff have put a great amount of effort in so lets appreciate their effort and time they put into the server and make this server grow!

Il be on 2nite again after work, see you all there!

Read full topic

@BronzeGod wrote:

I like how you try to make the server look bad and provide no evidence as to how you think this is a leech. The problem with the RSPS community is people like you saying this to every new server. You have yet to log on and still call it a leech. This is why there are a few of newer successful RSPSs, because of people like you.

Newest Update:
Fixed ice warrior slayer task

Fixed waterfiend slayer task
Fixed Korasi’s drop rate
Raised extremely rare drop rates

Created dominion factor shop

Previous Update:
Added varrock teleport tabs to magic shop
Allowed players to teleport with tabs under level 20 wilderness
Paladin armor will now announce as a rare drop
Unicorn/wolpertinger pouches added to shop
Completionist cape announcement fixed
Fixed ::forums bug
Fixed 120 dungeoneering announcement
Fixed dungeoneering master cape given at 120

[size=24pt]ABOUT[/size]
BronzeGod 718’s goal is to provide free-to-play entertainment for veteran players looking to play Pre-EoC servers. We constantly provide new updates and fixes to make BronzeGod a more enjoyable server. Our website has a basic layout with easy navigation, and our forums have a professional layout, making them simple and user-friendly. What are you waiting for? Join BronzeGod 718 today and start your adventure!

[size=24pt]CONTENT[/size]

[ul][li]Unique Hometown
Convinient Shops
Organized Teleporting System
ALL skills trainable
Perfected XP rates
